title: Kitne Gazi Aye Kitne Gazi Gaye
author: Anand Ranganathan
about: Anand Ranganathanâ€™s 'Kitne Gazi Aye Kitne Gazi Gaye' is a thought-provoking analysis of historical conflicts, ideological battles, and the resilience of a civilization. The book delves into the impact of radical ideologies on India's socio-political landscape, drawing insights from history, philosophy, and contemporary events. With meticulous research and compelling arguments, Ranganathan presents a narrative that challenges conventional perspectives and sparks intellectual discourse.
